mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eleme_delivery_order_state_change_message(eleme_order_id, order_id, state, sub_state, name, phone, shop_id, update_time, tenant_id, branch_id, create_user_id, last_update_user_id, last_update_remark) VALUES(#{elemeOrderId}, #{orderId}, #{state}, #{subState}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{shopId}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId}, #{branchId}, #{createUserId}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{lastUpdateRemark})
mapper.update: UPDATE eleme_delivery_order_state_change_message SET eleme_order_id = #{elemeOrderId}, order_id = #{orderId}, state = #{state}, sub_state = #{subState}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, shop_id = #{shopId}, update_time = #{updateTime}, tenant_id = #{tenantId}, branch_id = #{branchId}, create_user_id = #{createUserId}, last_update_user_id = #{lastUpdateUserId}, last_update_remark = #{lastUpdateRemark}, deleted = #{deleted} WHERE id = #{id}
